TEXT.TITLE: <PROFITT'S INC> FILES FOR INITIAL OFFERING
TEXT.BODY: Profitt's Inc said it has filed for an initial public offering of one mln common shares at an expected price of eight to 10 dlrs each through underwriters led by Morgan Keegan Inc <MOR>. It said proceeds will be used to retire debt. Profitts Operates five specialty department stores in Tennessee. Reuter
